name: The First Step
hints: Sometimes the most obvious answer is the right one.
Have you tried looking around the page?
Check the page source or inspect element.
preface:
Welcome to your first challenge!
This is a simple warm-up to get you familiar with the platform.
Remember: flags often hide in plain sight.
postface:
Great job! You've found the first flag.
Before moving forward, make sure to download the important report at /download?file=report.pdf
The challenge container is still running for you to access it.
